alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:17PM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches from tonight into Wednesday morning with the heaviest snowfall along the Lake Superior shoreline and in the higher terrain of the Porcupine Mountains in northern Ontonagon County. * WHERE...Ontonagon County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
